document_data.name: Wavegold Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: '''Wavegold''' was the middle ruling dynasty of [[Amn]] that lasted from [[1095 DR]] to [[1237 DR]].
document_data.History:
The Wavegolds came to rule during the crisis of the {{YearlinkName|1095}}, following the rapid assassinations of King [[Imnel Torlath IV|Imnel IV]], King [[Niskam Torlath|Niskam the Doomed]], King [[Rhor Torlath|Rhor the Lackey]], and King [[Dornak Torlath|Dornak the Puppet King]]. [[Erdhinn Wavegold I]] could trace a lineage from the early [[Torlath]] dynasty through [[Jamyll Torlath]], and took the throne to stabilize the realm before it collapsed completely.

The family ruled for over a century before misfortune and circumstance put an end to its name. King [[Belhinn Wavegold II]] died fighting the [[orc]]s of the [[Black Horde]] in the {{YearlinkName|1237}}, and the crown passed to the husband of his daughter, Princess [[Peldara Wavegold|Peldara]]. This made his son-in-law King [[Malek Parhek|Malek]] of the [[Parhek]] dynasty, the last royal family of Amn.
